sqlReaderQuery.value:
select CinemaCode as cinema_code,
CinemaName as cinema_name,
MovieId as movie_id,
TicketCount as ticket_count,
TicketPrice as ticket_price,
TransactionId as transaction_id,
TransactionDt as transaction_date
from dbo.Tickets
where 1 = 1
and TransactionDt > '@{activity('getLastTickets').output.firstRow.last_value}'
and TransactionDt <= '@{activity('getMaxTickets').output.firstRow.max_value}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select last_value from dbo.watermark_table where table_name = 'Tickets'
select max(TransactionDt) as max_value from dbo.Tickets
select last_value from dbo.watermark_table where table_name = 'json_files_module_7'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select container, folder, file_name, schema_name, table_name, filemask, column_delimiter, encoding, escape_character, quote_character, diu, column_mapping
from etl.tControlMetadata
order by container, folder, filemask

select
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as pipeline_name,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as pipeline_run_id,
'upload_files_to_db' as activity_name,
'@{activity('upload_files_to_db').output.billingReference.billableDuration[0].duration}' as billing_duration,
'@{activity('upload_files_to_db').output.copyDuration}' as copy_duration,
'@{utcNow()}' as end_time,
'@{activity('upload_files_to_db').output.billingReference.billableDuration[0].meterType}' as meter_type,
'@{activity('upload_files_to_db').output.usedParallelCopies}' as number_of_parallel_copies,
'@{activity('upload_files_to_db').output.filesRead}' as number_of_processed_files,
'@{activity('upload_files_to_db').output.rowsRead}' as number_of_read_and_written_rows,
'@{activity('upload_files_to_db').output.usedDataIntegrationUnits}' as number_of_used_DIU,
'@{activity('upload_files_to_db').output.usedDataIntegrationUnits}' as value,
'@{activity('upload_files_to_db').output.executionDetails[0].profile.queue.duration}' as queue_duration,
'@{activity('upload_files_to_db').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as start_time,
'@{activity('upload_files_to_db').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as status,
'@{activity('upload_files_to_db').output.executionDetails[0].profile.transfer.duration}' as transfer_duration
